name: Quest of Eternity: The Great Decay
name_original: Quest of Eternity: The Great Decay
description:
Quest of Eternity: The Great Decay is an action-horror-adventure where you must fight along your fellow knights to rescue the princess from the undead trapped on the island. They have prepared you in many variations of this quest; are you finally capable of this one?

For more check out my IndieDB page

(Updating later today with a few requested features and another level)

WASD replaces the arrow keys. E picks up a weapon, Left click attacks. The rest is easy to figure out.
